Variable

Data
  Base data types 
  1. numeric
    a. int - Integer 
      eg. 1,-5,0
    b. float - Floating point
      eg. 5.7,11.12
    c. complex - Complex numbers
      eg. 7j,5f
    int+int=int
    int-int=int
    int*int=int
    int/int=float
    int//int=int
    
    int any operation by float is float
    
  2. boolean - True / False
  
  Container data types
   1. str - String     
   2. seq - sequence
    a. list
    b. tuple
    c. range
    
   3. dict - Mapping
   
   4. set 
    a. set
    b. frozenset
     
   5. binary sequence
    a. bytes
    b. bytearray
    c. memoryview
